h3.a: Updated 3/27/2020 - Bibb County Schools Coronavirus Statement

div.div: Click the link (title) for the full statement.

New student registration is now live. This includes new Kindergarten and transfer students only for the 2020-2021 school year. Returning student registration will go live in May. Click the title for a link to the registration page.

h3.a: 2019 Bibb County School System Teachers of the Year

img.alt: System Teachers of the Year at the February 12 Board Meeting

div.div: Congratulations to Karie Jane Davis - Elementary and Tiffany Roddy - Secondary!

img.alt: 2019 School Teachers of the Year at the February 12 Board Meeting

div.div: Bibb County recognized their school and district Teachers of the Year at the February 12, 2019 Board of Education meeting.

img.alt: Middle School Computer Grant Award. Lawley, Blocker, Box, McGee with $25,000 Check.

div.div: Centreville Middle and West Blocton Middle were awarded a Middle School Computer Initiative Grant by the Alabama Department of Education.
